name: pigeon-crypto-dashboard
description: A dashboard that overlays urban pigeon sightings with cryptocurrency prices

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:integration: cd frontend && npm test Dashboard.integration.test.tsx && cd ../backend && npm test integration.test.ts
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist backend/dist build reports node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules
